name: Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program (HVRP) - Mountain Comprehensive Care Center
description: Federal grant program focused exclusively on competitive employment for veterans experiencing homelessness. Provides job training, case management, and placement services to connect homeless veterans with local employers. The program is administered by Mountain Comprehensive Care Center and serves veterans in need of employment assistance and reintegration support. Offers comprehensive services including job training, career counseling, and employment placement to help homeless veterans achieve sustainable employment and housing stability.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-5:00 PM (call for specific program hours)
eligibility: Veterans experiencing homelessness who need employment assistance and reintegration support
services: Job training, Case management, Employment placement, Career counseling, Veterans reintegration support, Employment assistance
notes: Program is administered by Mountain Comprehensive Care Center. Vivian Taylor serves as Employment Case Manager for the HVRP program. This is the only federal grant program focused exclusively on competitive employment for veterans experiencing homelessness. For immediate behavioral health crisis assistance, call 24 Hour Helpline at 1-800-422-1060.
